ggplot(data=data_birthrates,mapping = aes(x=data_birthrates[,1],y=data_birthrates[,2],label=data_birthrates[,3])) +

  geom_point(size=3) +
  geom_text(hjust=1.2,vjust=0) +
  scale_color_brewer(type = "qual", palette = "Dark2") +
  scale_x_reverse() +
